channel.title: Coding a server help - Co Owner position up for grabs!
channel.description:
[i][size=18pt]Need help with making an RSPS server. I want to start a server, with nearly all working skills. I know how to basic code things like commands etc but i need help with the more detailed side. I know how to get a source, but i cant find any ones i need as i always have trouble with compiling or changing all the Server name to my server.
Here are the requirements i need from you:
Very good coding knowledge - how to make working skills etc Preferably experience in coding or hosting a rsps Knowledge of portforwarding and how to get the server online Help me run a forum for the server
If someone can help me run and code the server they will be given Co - Owner with full access to the server and forum as an owner.
Email me - zenoxhd@live.co.uk MSN - zenoxhd@live.co.uk Post Back also.[/size][/i]

item.title: Coding a server help - Co Owner position up for grabs!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

arham 4:

For a beginner I always started with a pking server. It is WAY easier to start with.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding a server help - Co Owner position up for grabs!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Zenox, post:3, topic:386445”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=482205.msg3531390#msg3531390 date=1300207542]
Listen, I can tell that you are a beginner. So just get this:

The Starter Pack of a Life Time!

This starter pack will help you ALOT! To change the server name, just tell me the server name and I will continue what I am saying.
[/quote]

Thanks man ill download and see what i can do.

But for working skills?
How i code that?[/quote]
Just updated post, read that. For a beginner like you, I don’t think you should go into skills right now. For a beginner I always started with a pking server. It is WAY easier to start with.

Try using this guys tutorials:

CNNRS

And to start a server:

RSPS Ultimate Starter Guide

Just don’t follow his Objects tutorial as it isn’t for the client I gave you.

Read full topic

item.title: Coding a server help - Co Owner position up for grabs!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Listen, I can tell that you are a beginner. So just get this:

The Starter Pack of a Life Time!

This starter pack will help you ALOT! To change the server name, just go in client.java and press ctrl + f and type in the little box “your server name here” without the “”. Replace them all with the name of the server you want. For example, you change your server name here to Ulmata. Continue doing this until the finder is unable to find it. In the package, there is a folder called “HELPFUL STUFF” Double click it and then double click the folder (ZodiacReign Package V8.0 The Awakining). You will find Voule’s tools. Double click that folder and find Voele Command Generator. Doble click it, fill in the blanks, and you should press Generate. Their will be a little code at the bottom. Copy it and go back to your source. Press client.java again and search if (command. You will see:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

Above the code, press enter and paste the code you generated from the generator. Go to compiler and you will see a whole command. Replace the whole thing with this:

@echo off
java server
pause

Now press it and it will start to compile. wait till it says press to continue. When it does, press a button and it will exit out. Your changes are now saved. You can now play. P.M me if you have any more questions.

Read full topic
item.source: Coding a server help - Co Owner position up for grabs!
